source.name: Mnemonic Phrase Security
source.instructions: Which of the following statements is true regarding mnemonic phrases (also known as seed phrases) in cryptocurrency wallets?

answers.answer: Mnemonic phrases can be safely shared with wallet support staff for recovery purposes
A mnemonic phrase can be used to restore a wallet on different devices or applications
Mnemonic phrases are only used for Bitcoin wallets
If you lose your mnemonic phrase, you can easily generate a new one for your existing wallet
Mnemonic phrases typically consist of 5-10 random words

source.guidance: The correct answer is "A mnemonic phrase can be used to restore a wallet on different devices or applications". This is a key feature of mnemonic phrases, allowing users to recover their wallets across various platforms. The other options are incorrect because: sharing mnemonic phrases with anyone, including support staff, compromises security; mnemonic phrases are used for various cryptocurrencies, not just Bitcoin; lost mnemonic phrases cannot be regenerated for existing wallets; and mnemonic phrases typically consist of 12 or 24 words, not 5-10.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT understand the importance and proper handling of mnemonic phrases in cryptocurrency wallets
